类 Recipe

java.lang.Object
dao.mappers.Recipe
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class Recipe extends Object implements Serializable
Recipe entity class representing a recipe in the recipe management system. This class contains all the information about a recipe including basic details, nutritional information, and cooking instructions metadata.
从以下版本开始:
1.0
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Recipe

      public Recipe()
      Default constructor for Recipe. Creates an empty Recipe object with default values.

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int recipeId, String recipeName, int serveAmount, int preparationTime, int cookingTime)
      Constructor for Recipe with basic information. Initializes nutritional values to zero.
      参数:
      recipeId - the unique identifier for the recipe
      recipeName - the name of the recipe
      serveAmount - the number of servings
      preparationTime - the preparation time in minutes
      cookingTime - the cooking time in minutes

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int recipeId, String recipeName, int serveAmount, int cookingTime, int preparationTime, String imageUrl)
      Constructor for Recipe with basic information and image URL. Initializes nutritional values to zero.
      参数:
      recipeId - the unique identifier for the recipe
      recipeName - the name of the recipe
      serveAmount - the number of servings
      cookingTime - the cooking time in minutes
      preparationTime - the preparation time in minutes
      imageUrl - the URL or path to the recipe image

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Recipe object. Includes all recipe properties for debugging and logging purposes.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
      返回:
      a string containing all recipe information
